data.name: CVE-2020-6166
data.document: A flaw in the WordPress plugin, Minimal Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode through 2.15, allows authenticated users with basic access to export settings and change maintenance-mode themes.

data.name: CVE-2020-6168
data.document: A flaw in the WordPress plugin, Minimal Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode through 2.10, allows authenticated users with basic access to enable and disable maintenance-mode settings (impacting the availability and confidentiality of a vulnerable site, along with the integrity of the setting).

data.name: CVE-2020-6750
data.document: GSocketClient in GNOME GLib through 2.62.4 may occasionally connect directly to a target address instead of connecting via a proxy server when configured to do so, because the proxy_addr field is mishandled. This bug is timing-dependent and may occur only sporadically depending on network delays. The greatest security relevance is in use cases where a proxy is used to help with privacy/anonymity, even though there is no technical barrier to a direct connection. NOTE: versions before 2.60 are unaffected.

data.name: CVE-2010-3282
data.document: 389 Directory Server before 1.2.7.1 (aka Red Hat Directory Server 8.2) and HP-UX Directory Server before B.08.10.03, when audit logging is enabled, logs the Directory Manager password (nsslapd-rootpw) in cleartext when changing cn=config:nsslapd-rootpw, which might allow local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the log.

data.name: CVE-2012-1915
data.document: EllisLab CodeIgniter 2.1.2 allows remote attackers to bypass the xss_clean() Filter and perform XSS attacks.

data.name: CVE-2012-2142
data.document: The error function in Error.cc in poppler before 0.21.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a PDF containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

data.name: CVE-2012-2226
data.document: Invision Power Board before 3.3.1 fails to sanitize user-supplied input which could allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code by uploading a malicious file.

data.name: CVE-2012-2931
data.document: PHP code injection in TinyWebGallery before 1.8.8 allows remote authenticated users with admin privileges to inject arbitrary code into the .htusers.php file.

data.name: CVE-2012-3490
data.document: The (1) my_popenv_impl and (2) my_spawnv functions in src/condor_utils/my_popen.cpp and the (3) systemCommand function in condor_vm-gahp/vmgahp_common.cpp in Condor 7.6.x before 7.6.10 and 7.8.x before 7.8.4 does not properly check the return value of setuid calls, which might cause a subprocess to be created with root privileges and allow remote attackers to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

data.name: CVE-2012-4434
data.document: fwknop before 2.0.3 allow remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (server crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

references.name: [oss-security] 20120919 Re: CVE Request -- fwknop 2.0.3: Multiple security issues
[oss-security] 20120919 CVE Request -- fwknop 2.0.3: Multiple security issues

data.name: CVE-2012-5558
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Smiley module 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 and Smileys module 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 for Drupal allows remote authenticated users with the "administer smiley" permission to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a smiley acronym.

references.name: [oss-security] 20121120 Re: CVE Request for Drupal Contributed Modules

data.document: The TablePress plugin 1.9.2 for WordPress allows tablepress[data] CSV injection by Editor users. Note: The vendor disputes this issue and argues that this responsibility lies with the application that opens the CSV file and not TablePress.

data.document: NGINX before 1.17.7, with certain error_page configurations, allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ability of an attacker to read unauthorized web pages in environments where NGINX is being fronted by a load balancer.

data.name: CVE-2012-2950
data.document: Gateway Geomatics MapServer for Windows before 3.0.6 contains a Local File Include Vulnerability which allows remote attackers to execute local PHP code and obtain sensitive information.

data.document: Samsung Kies before 2.5.0.12094_27_11 contains a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability which could allow remote attackers to perform a denial of service.

data.document: Samsung Kies before 2.5.0.12094_27_11 has arbitrary file execution.

data.document: The awesome-support plugin 5.8.0 for WordPress allows XSS via the post_title parameter.

data.name: CVE-2019-20182

data.name: CVE-2019-20183
data.document: uploadimage.php in Employee Records System 1.0 allows upload and execution of arbitrary PHP code because file-extension validation is only on the client side. The attacker can modify global.js to allow the .php extension.

data.name: CVE-2019-20184
data.document: KeePass 2.4.1 allows CSV injection in the title field of a CSV export.

data.name: CVE-2020-5504
data.document: In phpMyAdmin 4 before 4.9.4 and 5 before 5.0.1, SQL injection exists in the user accounts page. A malicious user could inject custom SQL in place of their own username when creating queries to this page. An attacker must have a valid MySQL account to access the server.

data.name: CVE-2019-20373
data.document: LTSP LDM through 2.18.06 allows fat-client root access because the LDM_USERNAME variable may have an empty value if the user's shell lacks support for Bourne shell syntax. This is related to a run-x-session script.

data.name: CVE-2019-20374
data.document: A mutation cross-site scripting (XSS) issue in Typora through 0.9.9.31.2 on macOS and through 0.9.81 on Linux leads to Remote Code Execution through Mermaid code blocks. To exploit this vulnerability, one must open a file in Typora. The XSS vulnerability is then triggered due to improper HTML sanitization. Given that the application is based on the Electron framework, the XSS leads to remote code execution in an unsandboxed environment.

data.name: CVE-2020-6756
data.document: languageOptions.php in Rasilient PixelStor 5000 K:4.0.1580-20150629 (KDI Version) allows unauthenticated attackers to remotely execute code via the lang parameter.

data.name: CVE-2020-6757
data.document: contentHostProperties.php in Rasilient PixelStor 5000 K:4.0.1580-20150629 (KDI Version) allows authenticated attackers to remotely execute code via the name parameter.

data.name: CVE-2020-6758
data.document: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Option/optionsAll.php in Rasilient PixelStor 5000 K:4.0.1580-20150629 (KDI Version) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the ContentFrame parameter.

data.name: CVE-2019-20375
data.document: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Electronic Logbook (ELOG) 3.1.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the value parameter in a localization (loc) command to elogd.c.

data.name: CVE-2019-20376
data.document: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Electronic Logbook (ELOG) 3.1.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted SVG document to elogd.c.
